actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend for 4 years the exclusion from gross income of amounts which represent a discharge of indebtedness under certain student loan programs.

summary.text: Extends until January 1, 1983, provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1976 which exclude from gross income a discharge of indebtedness under certain student loan programs.

titles.title: A bill to extend for 4 years the exclusion from gross income of amounts which represent a discharge of indebtedness under certain student loan programs.
